tweet.text: May 31: President Reagan spoke to students & faculty at Moscow State University, quoting a passage from Pasternak’s “Doctor Zhivago” on human freedom. https://t.co/0aCtPYZibC #FRUS 📷 @Reagan_Library https://t.co/OydC24IYM5
